generated_doNotEdit.title: Avoid Mob Type Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the entity to run away from other entities that meet the criteria specified.

fields.title: Avoid Mob Sound
fields.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding another mob.

fields.title: Avoid Target Xz
fields.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this XZ Distance.

fields.title: Avoid Target Y
fields.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this Y Distance.

fields.title: Entity Types
fields.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to avoid.

fields.title: Ignore Visibility
fields.description: Whether or not to ignore direct line of sight while this entity is running away from other specified entities.

fields.title: Max Dist
fields.description: Maximum distance to look for an avoid target for the entity.

fields.title: Max Flee
fields.description: How many blocks away from its avoid target the entity must be for it to stop fleeing from the avoid target.

fields.title: Escape Event
fields.description: Event that is triggered when escaping from a mob.

fields.title: Probability Per Strength
fields.description: Percent chance this entity will stop avoiding another entity based on that entity's strength, where 1.0 = 100%.

fields.title: Remove Target
fields.description: Determine if we should remove target when fleeing or not.

fields.title: Sound Interval
fields.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

fields.title: Sprint Distance
fields.description: How many blocks within range of its avoid target the entity must be for it to begin sprinting away from the avoid target.

fields.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

fields.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
